Name: Graph
Desc: Core graph plotting and visualization provider for VulpiniQ.
LongDesc: The Graph module provides the foundation for creating and managing various types of graphs and charts in VulpiniQ. It offers a flexible API for rendering, updating, and customizing graph components.
Example:
// Using Q helper to create and show a Graph
Q.Graph().data([10, 20, 30]).appendTo(document.body);
